main event: A witness observed a large, luminous sphere emitting a bright light in the sky for approximately 1.5 minutes on November 5, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as moving at a high rate of speed., The witness saw the object from their car as it passed overhead., The object emitted a bright light and was surrounded by a flaming red mass at one point., The radio in the car stopped working while the object was visible., No air traffic or ground traffic was reported at the time of the sighting.
